name: Vr Airborne Car Racer: 3D Virtual Reality 2016
name_original: Vr Airborne Car Racer: 3D Virtual Reality 2016
description:
Have you ever wanted to be the fastest Airborne car racer? WELL NOW YOU CAN!!
Pick your wanted Airborne car and join the extreme racing challenge. Race head to head with opponents cars to become a racing champion. Airborne car’s gear is in full throttle and the foot is on the pedal, all you have to do is take control and drive your real Super Cars on some of the fastest racing tracks around. Realize your dream with this Free, Fast, and action packed formula cars racing game. With this High Speed Racing game you will think that you are a a Real driver of furious Super Cars racing. Zoom around in the fastest cars on three different tracks - each difficult than the previous one - and three distinct surroundings to enhance your driving pleasure.
Real Airborne racing has been made for the lovers of speed. Drive your automatic real Super formula Cars around the 3d challenging environment, spin around corners, drifting, crushing, and do as much as you can.

If you like full and free racing games, challenges and the smell of the asphalt, Real Airborne car racing is perfect for you!

How to Play:
- Move the car left and right by swiping left and right.
- Pick up fuel tanks to full your fuel tanks.
- Power ups like slow mo will slow down and boost will boost your car.
- Collect virtual cash from the track to unlock new cars
